Description: Serpentine(?) shabti of Padiamenemipt with a lappet-wig, a modelled face, an incised collar and crossed arms in relief holding two hoes; the leg section is inscribed with part of Chapter 6 of The Book of The Dead in four(surviving) rows of incised Hieroglyphs; the lower leg section has broken away.
Condition: incomplete - lower leg section missing, damage to head and one shoulder
